name: nativescript-acs-bluetooth
description: NativeScript ASB bluetooth card reader interface

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-acs-bluetooth && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android --device=54ab411c --sdk 23 --syncAllFiles
scripts.demoapp.android: npm i && cd ../demoapp && tns run android --device=54ab411c --sdk 23 --syncAllFiles
